Description: Fragments of funerary papyri including Books of the Dead of Ankhpakhered and Takerheb written in hieratic script; black line vignettes.
Curator's comments: Part of 1993,0120.4 Bibliography: Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 86-87, pls. 52-52.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (22 & 239)
Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (pp.86-87, pls.51-52) (publication of fragment OC 1457)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57273) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57273)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: salt precipitate, displaced fragments, fractured, loss Black ink Backed: brown paper Backed: white paper Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
